title: Can India be a player in the computer chip industry?
full_text: Can India be a player in the computer chip industry?. India is investing hundreds of millions of dollars in building up a computer chip industry.. Priti GuptaTechnology Reporter Tejas Networks supplies equipment for mobile phone networks and broadband connections A reliable supply of computer chips is essential for Arnob Roy, the co-founder o… [+5498 chars]
